title: Meghan launches female mentorship program to mark her 40th birthday
description: To mark her 40th birthday, Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, has launched a mentorship program to support women getting back into the workforce after the pandemic.

title: Journalist was at a cafe when Taliban attacked. Hear his story
description: Journalist Ali Latifi discusses the scene in the capital and largest city of Afghanistan, Kabul, after the blast from the Taliban.

title: See the dried up reservoir that's shutting down a power plant
description: Lake Oroville, a reservoir that provides water for a hydroelectric power plant in California, is so low that it must be shut down for the first time since it opened in the 60's.

title: Andrew Cuomo long claimed to be a champion against sexual harassment and attacked GOP politicians for staying silent
Cuomo long claimed to be champion against sexual harassment and attacked Republicans for silence
description:
• Analysis: Cuomo's utterly disastrous response to AG report findings
• Report spotlights Cuomo brothers' relationship

title: Real estate tycoon Robert Durst, accused of killing his close friend, to take the stand today
description: Robert Durst, the multimillionaire subject of the HBO crime documentary "The Jinx," is expected to take the witness stand in his defense Wednesday, his legal team told CNN, heaping more drama onto an already sensational murder trial.

title: The speed of the US economic recovery has been record-breaking. But don't get used to it
description: Despite the continued optimism about the country reopening, US economic growth is already starting to slow.

title: WHO calls for moratorium on booster shots until at least September to enable more widespread vaccination
ABC News: Trump loyalist at DOJ circulated draft Georgia letter with false election fraud claims
description: A draft letter reportedly circulated late last year by a Donald Trump-loyalist at the Justice Department shows the lengths his allies were willing to go to overturn the presidential election.

title: Rihanna is now officially a billionaire and the wealthiest female musician
description: Robyn "Rihanna" Fenty is officially a billionaire, according to Forbes.

title: Lizzo started a rumor she's pregnant with Chris Evans' baby and he loves it
description: Lizzo and Chris Evans are having lots of fun with their very public flirtation.

title: WHO calls for a moratorium on booster shots until at least the end of September
description: The World Health Organization is calling for a moratorium on booster shots until at least the end of September, WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said during a news briefing in Geneva on Wednesday.

title: Obama scales back big birthday bash amid Covid worries
description: Former President Barack Obama has dramatically scaled back his planned 60th birthday party on Martha's Vineyard this weekend due to concerns about the highly transmissible Delta variant of Covid-19, according to a spokeswoman.

title: Hubble captures stunning image of squabbling galaxies
description: A galactic sibling rivalry is taking place millions of light-years away, and the Hubble Space Telescope has captured it in a stunning image.

title: 33 years ago, I was in the same room with Iran's new president when he voted to execute political prisoners
description: August 3, 2021, marked the start of Ebrahim Raisi's four-year term as president of Iran. The validation ceremony took place in the "Beyt" (Arabic for "house") of the Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, as a prelude to Raisi's inauguration.

title: Sean Combs on life without Kim Porter and posting that throwback Jennifer Lopez photo
description: Sean "Diddy" Combs believes he's been given a second chance.

title: Floods are getting worse, and the number of people exposed is 10 times higher than previously thought, study finds
description: Amid a deadly summer of flooding in different parts of the world, scientists have found the number of people at risk to extreme flooding has grown significantly in the past two decades.

title: Trump asks court to end House pursuit of his tax returns from IRS
description: Former President Donald Trump's legal team formally stepped into a long-running fight over a US House request for his tax returns, claiming Trump's financial history is being unfairly pursued for political reasons by Democrats and seeking to end House Ways and Means Committee investigations into the ex-President and his companies.

title: Christian Eriksen reunited with Inter teammates as he begins road to recovery
description: Christian Eriksen has returned to the Inter Milan training ground for the first time since suffering a cardiac arrest while playing for Denmark at Euro 2020, the Italian club said on Wednesday.

title: Democrats are losing the messaging war, according to Democrats
description: These two paragraphs from Politico are eye-opening:

title: Doctor: 'Nauseating' these governors forbid mask mandates
description: Dr. Jorge Rodriguez, an internal medicine specialist and viral researcher, criticizes GOP governors Greg Abbott and Ron DeSantis for banning mask mandates in schools, calling it the "wrong thing to do" as coronavirus case counts rise in the US.

title: Frontier Airlines now supports flight crew who restrained man who allegedly assaulted them
description: Frontier Airlines now says it "supports" and will pay the crew of flight attendants it had earlier said were suspended after restraining a passenger charged with groping and punching them.

title: Offspring drummer says band axed him from tour for not getting vaccinated
description: Pete Parada says he's been dropped from his band The Offspring and their tour over his refusal to get vaccinated.

title: Giraffes have been misunderstood and are just as socially complex as elephants, study says
description: With their crane-like necks, spindle legs and knobbly knees, giraffes are among the best loved and most recognizable of animals.

title: Nearly 2 million lives were lost. Now divers search for remains
description: As he slipped through the kelp forest to the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean, Kamau Sadiki's eyes hooked onto something resembling the item he and fellow divers had been searching for.

title: Avlon: Carlson is flirting with authoritarian leader
description: CNN's John Avlon analyzes Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban's regime as Fox News host Tucker Carlson makes a trip to the country to broadcast his show.

title: Wuhan taking drastic action to stop spread of Delta variant
description: China's spiraling outbreak of the Delta variant of Covid-19 has hit Wuhan, the original epicenter of the pandemic, prompting citywide coronavirus testing as authorities scramble to contain the city's first reported local infections in more than a year. CNN's David Culver reports from Wuhan, China.

title: Brutal heatwave scorches southern Europe as continent's summer of extreme weather rages on
description: Extreme heat and wildfires continued to plague parts of southern Europe on Wednesday, a day after the top temperature in Greece reached 47.1 degrees Celsius (117 degrees Fahrenheit) -- just shy of the highest ever recorded in Europe.

title: Remember when the internet lost its mind over Barack Obama's Stan Smith sneakers?
description: After years of unadventurous presidential-wear and routine dad dressing, all it took was a pair of tennis shoes to spark joy. Or maybe it was the sight of Barack Obama's sockless ankles peeking out from beneath his slim olive-green chinos.

title: The Delta variant is a threat to these stocks
description: If you're a company that manages ticket sales for concerts and other live events, it makes sense that after a long 18 months, you'd be getting excited about the future.

title: Three people killed and eight seriously injured in Czech train crash
description: Three people died and eight were seriously injured on Wednesday when a Munich-to-Prague express train ran through a stop signal and collided with a local commuter train in the Czech Republic, Czech authorities said.

title: Biden shows he's ready to make drastic moves in Covid fight -- even if he's not sure they're legal
description: Even President Joe Biden doesn't know whether his new federal eviction moratorium for renters is legal and sustainable. But crushing humanitarian and political pressure left him no choice but to take a chance on an emergency move.

title: Japan's incredible convenience stores thrust into the Olympic spotlight
description: Tokyo is considered one of the world's top food cities, drawing travelers from around the world who spend their days sampling renowned Japanese dishes, from sushi to ramen.

title: Eerie video shows scene of murder investigation in Ukraine
description: CNN's Matthew Chance walks through the forested area outside of Kiev where Ukrainian police said the body of Belarusian activist Vitaly Shishov was found with "abrasions" and "peeled skin."

title: John Corbett says he and Bo Derek are finally married after 20 years together
description: Actor John Corbett has revealed that he and partner Bo Derek married at a secret ceremony in December.

title: World's oldest zoo panda celebrates with cake
description: Hong Kong Ocean Park's resident panda An An has just turned 35, making him the longest living male giant panda under human care in history. In panda years, that makes An An an impressive 105 years old.

title: A year since the world's largest non-nuclear blast and questions still remain
A year since the world's largest non-nuclear blast and questions still remain
description: • Bride speaks out one year after her wedding video went viral

title: Fourth day of protests after 9-year-old girl allegedly raped and murdered in Indian capital
description: Hundreds of people protested in the Indian capital Delhi on Wednesday for the fourth day straight, as outrage continues to build over the alleged rape and murder of a 9-year-old girl from one of India's most oppressed castes.

title: Beirut bride speaks out one year after her wedding video went viral
description: It should have been one of the happiest days of their lives. But for Dr. Israa Seblani and Ahmad Sbeih, August 4, 2020 will always be remembered as the day a deadly explosion hit Beirut.

title: IOC suspends its action on Raven Saunders' podium protest after her mother's death
description: The probe into US athlete Raven Saunders' X gesture at the Olympics has been suspended after she shared on social media that her mother has died, according to the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

title: California regulators vote to restrict water access for thousands of farmers amid severe drought
description: California water regulators voted Tuesday to restrict water access for thousands of Central Valley farmers as the state endures a severe drought.

title: China's biggest private companies are in chaos. It's all part of Beijing's plan
description: China's crackdown on private enterprise has wiped out more than $1.2 trillion in market value for many powerful Chinese companies and stoked fears about the future of innovation in the world's second largest economy.

title: Inside Maine church where most of the congregation is unmasked and unvaccinated
description: CNN's Gary Tuchman visits a church in Bangor, Maine, where the pastor and most of the congregation are unmasked, unvaccinated and defiant against Covid-19 restrictions.

title: Rare foods are on the brink of disappearing
description: Hidden amongst lush Welsh woods and fields of wildflowers, grows an assortment of rare vegetable varieties. They might look ordinary enough, but many have been saved from extinction.

title: Expert: Atmosphere of 'fear and intimidation' before election in Zambia
description: Judd Devermont of the Center for Strategic and International Studies talks to CNN's Lynda Kinkade about Zambian president Edgar Lungu, who has deployed the military amid pre-election violence.

title: Mom sold her blood to pay rent. See her reaction to incredible surprise
description: Dasha Kelly, a mother of three who was facing eviction, talks to CNN's Erin Burnett about donations and support she received on GoFundMe, including thousands in donations that came in during their interview, that will allow her family to stay in their home.

title: 'A master class in gaslighting': SE Cupp reacts to Cuomo statement
description: CNN political commentator SE Cupp weighs in on a report released by New York Attorney General Letitia James that accused Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D-NY) of sexually harassing 11 women and creating a hostile work environment.
